moves.9... dxe5 10. Nxe5 Qxd3: He should have played Qe6 pinning and putting pressure on the knight.
moves.15. Nxb5 a6 16. Nd4 c3 17. Nf5 Ra7 18. N: He resigned here, but I don't think he should have. The point is 18...eitherNxd7 19. Nxe7+. If 18...Rxd7 19. Rxd7 eitherNxd7 20. Nxe7+. However, their are other moves and he doesn't have to take it. If any one feels he should resign this position let me know. I think that the point of this annotation is to tell people not to stop at one or two moves. Really analyze if you feel you are lost.
